mapper.select:
select w.FNAME WarehouseName,w.FCODE WarehouseCode, l.FNAME PositionName,l.FCODE PositionCode,
from f left join MWMS_WH_WAREHOUSE w on f.WH_WAREHOUSE_ID=w.WH_WAREHOUSE_ID left join MWMS_WH_LOCATION l on f.WH_LOCATION_ID=l.WH_LOCATION_ID where f.MATSPLIT_ID = #{MATSPLIT_ID}
select count(*) FNum from f where f.FRelatedID = #{FRelatedID}
